answers.author: Paul Scher
answers.text:
A brief search via Googlescholar Beta rendered an informative study of the impacts of economic and quality of life impacts of Route 21 Freeway construction written by Robert Sasor and conducted in conjunction with the New Jersey Department of Transportation Bureau of Research and U.S. Department of Transportation Federal Highway Administration. I hope it provides a little bit of illumination on the subject. You can access this document at  http://1.usa.gov/eApc1Y

author: Unknown
text:
I am doing a little volunteer work for the Neighborhood Economic Development Corp. in Mesa, Arizona. Does anyone have a transportation survey they are willing to share. I am interested in surveys regarding how public transportation, particularly construction involving public transportation, might impact local merchants.
Jon L. Devner, Life Member
Retired
jondevner@yahoo.com
title: Life Member
